name: Format\TableRowStyle
description: The object for applying styles to rows in a table.

properties.name: backgroundColor
properties.description: The background color for the table row.

properties.name: conditional
properties.description: An array of styles to be applied only to rows that meet specified conditions. This can be used to create a table with alternating row background colors.

properties.name: divider
properties.description: The stroke style for the divider lines between rows.

properties.name: height
properties.description: The height of the table row, as an integer in points, or using the available units for components.
